resources.string: If you have any question, please ask the facilitator before you start.
In this task, you need to select the target (a red circle) on the screen, as quickly and as accurately as you can.
In this task, you need to select the target (a red cross) on the screen, as quickly and as accurately as you can.
Thank you for completing this block of the Finger Calibration Task.
Please ask the facilitator to guide you to the next block.
Please ask the facilitator to hand you the Digit Symbol Substitution Test.
